This works just edit 'system' file in main crysis directory and add: 'english' as first language in 2nd to last line and replace russian for english in last line.
can someone please explain the installation a bit more in depth please?

Verified that it works :)

For people needing a bit more help with the installation: 

1. Extract the contents of the rar file into their corresponding folders
2. Open the system.cfg file in your Crysis 3 directory with notepad
3. Change the last two lines from russian to english. These should now read 'sys_languages=english' and 'g_language=english'
4. Save the file and run Crysis 3
5. Enjoy! 

If you don't configure the system.cfg file the game will open but remain at a black screen. To be safe, you can also cut out all language files other than english in the localization and game folders.
